eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: westboy31, Tristan Rhodes (tristan@victrisgames.com)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
Ideal for explosions, hit/impacts, earthquake, etc.

> See [an example of using this extension here](https://victrisgames.itch.io/gdevelop-camera-shake-example).

Select one or more methods of shaking:

- Position:  Shake the X and Y position of the camera 
- Angle: Shake the rotation of the camera 
- Zoom: Shake the zoom level of the camera 

Control how long and how fast the camera shakes:

- Duration: Amount of time to shake the camera
- Time between shakes: Amount of time between each change of the movement of the camera
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: CameraShake
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Shake the camera on the specified layer using one or more methods of shaking (position, angle, zoom)

eventsFunctions.description: Shake the camera on the specified layer, using one or more ways to shake (position, angle, zoom)
eventsFunctions.name: CameraShake
eventsFunctions.sentence: Shake camera #_PARAM4_ on _PARAM3_ layer for _PARAM5_ seconds. Use an amplitude of _PARAM1_px on X axis and _PARAM2_px on Y axis, angle rotation amplitude _PARAM6_ degrees, and zoom amplitude _PARAM7_ percent.  Wait _PARAM8_ seconds between shakes.

events.comment: Pass input parameters to global variables so that onScenePostEvents can use them
Add default values if none were provided
If a shake is not in progress, save initial values.

parameters.description: Amplitude of shaking on the X axis (pixels) (For example: 5)
parameters.name: PowerX

parameters.description: Amplitude of shaking on the Y axis (pixels) (For example: 5)
parameters.name: PowerY

events.comment: Stop shaking when the duration has been reached
Calculate shake displacement once per shake timer
Calculate object position displacement, with linear decay over time
Calculate object angle displacement, with linear decay over time
Calculate camera zoome displacement, with linear decay over time
Caclulate the fraction of progress towards shake destination (based on timer)
Increase percentage from 0 to 1 for the first half of the shake:  2 * ((ShakeDuration - ShakeTimer) / ShakeDuration)
Decrease percentage from 1 to 0 for the second half of the shake: 2 - 2 * ((ShakeDuration - ShakeTimer) / ShakeDuration)
Always keep camera adjusted with current displacement values

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a camera shake is in progress.
eventsFunctions.name: IsShaking

eventsFunctions.description: Stop all camera shaking that was initiated by the Camera Shake extension.
eventsFunctions.name: StopShaking
